title: Graphon-Integrated Implicit Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of basic mathematical symbols and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing advanced mathematical concept acquisition through audio-visual-motor integration of mathematical symbols.

learning_goals: Learners can identify the correspondence between mathematical symbols and phonetic representations with 85% accuracy.
Formation of long-term memory for graph-sound correspondence within 12 weeks through multisensory integration activities (touch, auditory, visual).
Learners can reduce errors in the use of mathematical symbols by 50% when performing individual PBL (Project-Based Learning) tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
